projects.name: Full Stack E-Commerce Website with Dashboard & CMS
projects.description: The project aimed to offer an easy-to-use content management system for individuals seeking to both create and manage their eCommerce website. It combines a powerful admin dashboard serving as a Content Management System (CMS) and Admin interface.

projects.name: Sign language Detection System
projects.description: This project aims to develop a system that can recognize and interpret sign language gestures in real-time using deep learning techniques implemented with TensorFlow and OpenCV. By leveraging (CNNs) for image processing and classification, the system will be capable of accurately identifying hand gestures corresponding to specific signs.

experiences.description: Orchestrated and executed 15+ events, showcasing effective leadership and organisational skills. Led and empowered a team of 30+ members, ensuring optimal team performance.
